html:
11.20.20  2:40 pm   Could your answers be more vague?

      i'll see what i can do

11.20.20  2:18 pm   how did you predict 2020 in "i just did a bad thing"

      i didn't predict 2020 there, but i was already able to predict 2020 just by taking a look at the gregorian calendar. in fact, i hereby predict the year 2030 to start just over 9 years from now

11.20.20  2:13 pm   is the day still going on?

      more now than ever before

11.20.20  2:08 pm   How can I get inspiration?

      from molecules, but not actually the molecules it's the space between the molecules that's the most inspiring, because that's where you get to put your own molecules

11.20.20  1:53 pm   you have clarified might quit was not a joke, but that was not about youtube. what was it about?

      it's not always clear what songs are about. ideally they are supposed to be about everything in the universe simultaneously. but this one seems to have themes of independence, finding your way in the world, etc

11.20.20  1:42 pm   What bad thing did you do?

      did multiple good things which canceled each other out

11.20.20  1:00 pm   how do you feel about the current political climate of the USA

      .....................................dicey

11.20.20  12:49 pm   Why do you write songs?

      in case one of them accidentally fixes the entire universe and makes new ones while breaking all of them and fixing them at the same time

11.20.20  12:33 pm   Where is the Diamond Store?

      in my song list

11.20.20  12:14 pm   Where is the world?

      it's got to be somewhere around here

11.20.20  11:57 am   Do you know how to sing ?

      no one does. but that never stopped anyone from doing it

11.20.20  11:00 am   Hey Bill. How goes progress on the new video?

      pretty good

11.20.20  10:58 am   any tips on escaping a paradox

      i dare you to stay in it

11.20.20  9:57 am   how do i type

      have you tried rubbing the keyboard

11.20.20  6:02 am   What is existence

      could be you

11.20.20  5:45 am   is 17 too late to start learning the keyboard?

      probably not

11.20.20  4:08 am   Are you a person?

      oh that would explain a lot

11.20.20  3:37 am   Do you still doing collage 

      never heard of it

11.20.20  2:13 am   Are any of these questions supposed to be taken seriously?

      yes

11.20.20  1:33 am   how did you predict 2020 in your "just did a bad thing" lyrics?

      i didn't predict 2020 there, but i was already able to predict 2020 just by taking a look at the gregorian calendar. in fact, i hereby predict the year 2030 to start just over 9 years from now

11.20.20  12:32 am   when you write a song, do you start with music or lyrics?

      if i want it to go well, usually the best strategy is to do it all together

11.19.20  11:56 pm   Now that I know you're alive, was "Might Quit" just a statment saying you wouldnt be making videos anymore?

      not even close. if everything goes according to plan, i will make more videos in the future than i have made thus far

11.19.20  11:14 pm   have any advice for someone about to drop out of university? 

      all i can offer is spiritual advice, which can be found in my song 'it's the first day of school (and i think i might quit)'

11.19.20  10:00 pm   What do you like/prefer more, making songs or making videos* (*Song videos dont count)?

     why not

      Love your songs the way!

11.19.20  8:40 pm   what if school assigns an amount of work that is greater then the amount of time to do said work

      that might cause people to fail, or cheat

11.19.20  7:47 pm   When you eventually play your songs live, can you please have an entire horn section dedicated to the sparse yet beautiful horn hits you disperse through your various songs?

      it will not be the same song arrangement, but, there should be a horn section

11.19.20  7:46 pm   What inspires you to make content?

      waking up in the morning (or any time)

11.19.20  7:41 pm   Will you do your regular sort of videos once you are done with the big project?

     no, the 'big project' (i wouldn't really call it that, but, for the sake of argument, i suppose i can call it that) .... that 'big project' is making videos. so when i am done making videos, i will not make videos

     I am sure you have answered this before so sorry.

11.19.20  7:14 pm   Is might quit a song about learning to adjust to the norms of society while finding your own special place within.

      that seems plausible

11.19.20  6:52 pm   I sing " I bless the snow up in Canada" instead of Africa. Is this wrong?

      no

11.19.20  6:33 pm   What's the most stupid question you've ever gotten?

      i have never gotten a stupid question

11.19.20  5:48 pm   Opinion on Michael Jacksons music?

      it's pretty good

11.19.20  5:48 pm   How will you feel when you finish your video?

      strange, because i have a new company policy that says that videos are supposed to take a reasonable amount of time, but there still seems to be no feasible methodology to support this

11.19.20  5:47 pm   I would love to watch live streams of your creative/productive process.  After this next release, would you consider doing that?

      that would be fantastic, except there's probably no way to do that without leaking the entire song

11.19.20  4:59 pm   what are your thoughts on shrek? asking for scientific research

      i've never seen the movie, i just have all the shrek furniture

11.19.20  4:49 pm   Are you large enough for the mall yet? Or is the mall still closed because they don't want you going to the mall because you're just too small *small for the mall*?

      what the heck is a mall

11.19.20  4:43 pm   On your wiki article it said you are learning blender what are your thoughts on blender 2.9 

      like a hole in the head, do i need another catastrophic upgrade transition. i am using 2.8 and will be there for the next several years until i am ready to rip my life apart once more

11.19.20  4:40 pm   Are you planning on releasing lots of songs to make up for 1 year without new music?

      yes

11.19.20  4:06 pm   it was hard to compact the history of the world in just a 10 minute video?

      yes, i failed and it ended up being almost 20 minutes, but that was mostly impossible also

11.19.20  3:46 pm   What is your opinion on trees

      i like the idea

11.19.20  3:35 pm   With your thoughts on albums being when songs are crowded by others when playing them in succession, taking away your ability to appreciate single tracks, what is your view on live shows? Are they not similar?

     live performances usually allow for a lot of magic that is often not captured on recordings. but it is not yet entirely feasible to put together a band, venue, and audience, for only 1 song. this is probably similar to the logistical constraint albums used to have

     One song after the next, does that also bother you?

     yes

      How would you perform a live show?

     there are a lot of current circumstances that make live shows impossible for me

      Are you going to combine your whole setlist into one long jam?

     no

      That would be pretty awesome tbh..

     i tend to prefer songs to be in the 1-4 minute range

11.19.20  3:18 pm   Do you have a set date/deadline on finishing the music video

     i had one, but we're way past it already

      and how much 3d animation are you learning?

      just enough to over complicate things, but not enough to replicate any of the awesome splendor that i've seen in the outside world around me

11.19.20  3:13 pm   Why aren't you making videos?

      i am, but the reason it appears as though i am not making videos is because of a longstanding personal problem i have where i am consistently unable to envision a method that is feasible enough to accomplish in any reasonable time frame

11.19.20  3:11 pm   When you made "die" did you make it because you thought it would be funny for a first video or for fun?

      if you look 2 questions down, you will find someone being very overwhelmed by how crazy it is just to even think of writing music. i was dealing with the same type of overwhelm at that time. so, an interesting solution i found, was to try making songs that are extremely short, to reduce the chances of being hung up

11.19.20  3:07 pm   What are you working on right now if you want to answer ofcourse

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

11.19.20  3:05 pm   i really wanna write music but i have no idea where to begin, like, do i make the instrumental first? or the lyrics? or a little bit of both at once? music is a weird thing, man

      that's true, it's pretty insane. just remember that anything is possible, and take it one day at a time. or, fuck it, try to do every day at the same time. see what kind of results you get

11.19.20  3:05 pm   is "might quit" a song about you actually quitting youtube?

      not even close

11.19.20  2:59 pm   How are you doing, man? How's learning the new tech been going?

      pretty good, but it's further highlighting some of the inherent problems i have always had

11.19.20  2:55 pm   Why does the world makes no sense and total sense sometimes? 

      this is to keep you coming back for more

11.19.20  2:50 pm   Recently you've said that you only know what works best the FIRST time you hear it,

     you might have taken that out of context, but that sounds like something i've said about SONGWRITING

      but what happens when you know what you are going to need before you start? Is there a naive mode of thinking to trick your brain into finding flangers and phasers as interesting as when you first used them? Or is that something which you need before their practice and use can be picked up easily?

     i wasn't talking about the recording/production process. only the songwriting process, which, for me, happens entirely before the production of the song starts. so generally, no flangers or phasers are used
